name: Returning Dream
description:
Returning Dream is a game made for the Intrinsic Game Jam where a young girl has to go grab a medicinal herb for her grandma inside the forest. But she has to be careful in the way back, as the forest has mysterious properties that turn everything into a dreamy-like world.

The authors

Manel Mourelo Montero
Alex Campamar Redol
David Valdivia Martínez
Emili Ruiz Tellez
